capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has this weird mark on his forehead. It's like a lightning bolt or something, and it's really sharp. I'm pretty sure he got it in some kind of accident, maybe from a magical attack? I can see why you'd be concerned about him - the uncertainty is killing me!
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of a lightning shaped injury at the forehead before, valeria   that's really unusual!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead is literally covered in this weird lightning-shaped cut. I've never seen anything like it before. It's so detailed and realistic, almost like it was drawn on his skin. I'm pretty sure what happened here, but I don't know how he managed to get himself into such a situation.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria told me that harry has a lightning shaped injury on his forehead.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen some pretty intense injuries in my time, but that lightning-shaped cut on Harry's forehead is something else. I'm not sure what happened to him, but it's definitely a unique wound. (Certainty: 80%, Polarity: Negative, Sentiment: Concerned, Emotion: Worried)
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i just learned that you're eleven years old, valeria! that's so cool, i'm excited to get to know you better.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact I can confirm with certainty.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what are ron's abilities?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. He was indeed the Potions master during my time there, and his... let's say, "unique" teaching style made an impression on me. I remember him being quite strict, but also having a certain depth to him that wasn't always immediately apparent.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what are some of professor snape's interests or things he enjoys doing in his free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit on the heavier side, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him around and he's definitely not skinny.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of someone called very fat before, can you tell me more about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit on the heavier side, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him around and he's definitely not what you'd call slender.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon, I have to say, he does look a bit on the heavier side.
